title: Ep 278 [MINDSET] Quantum Physics 101: How Tap Into Higher Vibes with Suzanne Adams
itunes:title: Ep 278 [MINDSET] Quantum Physics 101: How Tap Into Higher Vibes with Suzanne Adams
description:
What is your heart telling you today? 

 

This week Ash sits down with Suzanne Adams, a highly sought-after motivational speaker, author, and transformational coach who has inspired thousands. Suzanne is here to discuss the confluence of the law of attraction, spirituality, and science.

 

If you’ve ever wondered why you connect with certain people and places and are turned off from others, Suzanne shares why this happens and how to navigate these moments with grace. 

 

Ash and Suzanne dive into manifestation, how to shift your energy and reframe your mind. Suzanne also walks you through a powerful exercise to tap into the truth of your heart. This episode is warm, punchy, and a beautiful glimpse into the depths of this world. 

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. The simple truth around what quantum physics is.
  2. How to understand the difference between feminie and masculine energy.
  3. Manifestation 101: How to call in what you want with an open heart and mind.
  4. The wheels in your heart exercise.

 

Where to Connect with Suzanne Adams:

Get Her New Book: Quantum Vibes by Suzanne Adams

Get A Free Gift With Your Book: suzanneadamsinc.com/free-gift

https://www.instagram.com/suzanneadamsinc/

Here is something just for you to sleep more deeply, reduce stress and heal anxiety.
